sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1407222859, "Illegalsetting of P1ASYNC(=1) and P1SYNCEGRESSFIFO(=1) for router is fixed": The issue is fixed.
2. 1407293560, "PSMI signal usage when XBAR arbiter enabled in the associated router is missing in router integration guide": Router psmi tests are passing now with and without pwa.
3. 1407049001, "Uniquify SG Lint waivers for SBR": SGLint waivers file is uniquified.
4. 1407122599, "99.5% Scan ATPG Coverage in SBR ": Sacn atpg coverage is 99.5 with the latest sage version.
5. 1407239724, "Router regression stalled with $tsa_udf ": This is fixed in this release.
6. 1909186216, "SBR UPF should use HDK UPF template": SBR is using HDK UPF template.
7. 1407122444, "TFM: SBR Post Visa tools SGCDC" : SGCDC post-VISA is enabled now.
8. 1505866583, "FWD [ADPLP] [PICr25] [Sandbox 18ww18c] SpyglassLP fail due to no isolation specific at unused parity_err_outCredit leakage on multicast loopback messages in Side Band Router" : The issue is fixed.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:
Removed the "cdc custom synchronizer" directives in the ACECDC control files.

Validation Updates:

General Updates:
Test support for the RTL updates.

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/home/default.html#magazine?id=101846185&contentId=1012194360

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.echo.intel.com/zircon/index.php/zirconIPDashboardTable.php?FiltersModel[IP_id]=17319&FiltersModel[Ver_id]=2.10&FiltersModel[ruleversion]=2.10.04&FiltersModel[App_id]=1&FiltersModel[Milestone]=4&FiltersModel[Rules_type]=IP&FiltersModel[top_filter_checkbox]=0&FiltersModel[showlatest]=0
